comments:
Using an IBM driver that uses WTP 02/09 driver cannot create any J2EE project once i try to create a EAR project. The following NPE is thrown.  This creates a dialog which you ok out of and same dialog and error is thrown again.  Killing the workbench and restarting with a -clean option only fixes it. We need a patch for this problem.

John,

Has this been seen recently? I wonder if the suspected platform bug that caused adapters to be randomly not found has been fixed. If this hasn't been seen recently, I vote that we close this...
Closing. Please re-open if it happens with a newer version of Eclipse.
Closing for now.  Will reopen if I run into this problem again.
